title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Topics Adoption Metrics Dashboard

description.newValue:
,Topics will include a new analytics page, where knowledge managers and admins will have access to a set of metrics that details the health of their adoption. Tenants will have health targets to reach to keep them on track for adopting Viva Topics, as well as recommended actions to perform to drive each metric to healthy.
GA date: April CY2023
Preview date: March CY2023
